meanings.sent1: Her unguardednesses led to her losing her wallet.
meanings.sent2: The unguardednesses of the hikers in the forest resulted in getting lost.
meanings.sent3: His unguardednesses around sweets always leads to overeating.
meanings.sent4: The unguardednesses of the fortress allowed the enemy to infiltrate easily.
meanings.sent5: The unguardednesses of leaving the door unlocked invited trouble.

meanings.definition: Vulnerability or openness to harm or danger
meanings.sent1: The unguardednesses of the old bridge made it unsafe to cross.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of unguardednesses when walking alone at night.
meanings.sent3: The unguardednesses of the cat around the dog led to a playful chase.
meanings.sent4: His unguardednesses in sharing personal information made him an easy target for scams.
meanings.sent5: The unguardednesses of the fragile vase made it susceptible to breaking.
